actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to Establish a Contiguous Fishery Zone Beyond the Territorial Sea of the United States," approved October 14, 1966.

summary.text: Extends the contiguous fishery zone beyond the territorial sea of the United States from nine nautical miles to either two hundred nautical miles or to a point corresponding to a depth of five hundred and fifty meters, whichever alternative produces the greater breadth.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to Establish a Contiguous Fishery Zone Beyond the Territorial Sea of the United States," approved October 14, 1966.
